content: this pattern was written after the messy bun crochet hat nearly broke the internet at the time it went viral there was not a pattern for it so i created this pattern for my daughter i only created the one size adult but you can easily make it smaller or larger shorter or longer it s a very simple pattern gauge information 8 double_crochet stitches & 4 row = 2 if you use a heavier worsted weight yarn i used red heart unfortgettable then you will have sizing issues unless you use a smaller hook size or make adjustments to the number of stitches you chain and increase up to measurements with unforgettable diameter of hole - 2 1/2 - 3 length up to brim just over 5 length with brim just over 7 1/2 width across when laying flat 8 1/2 will fit up to 23 head my head update 12/18/16 i have updated the pattern to include an alternative brim - a f&bpdc brim very lovely and i also added some alternative row to the hat to add a bit of texture if all that double_crochet gets a little boring -
